mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(N.NNO) FROM NEIGHBOR N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.NEIGHBOR_MNO=M.MNO) JOIN MARU_MEMBER MM ON(M.MNO=MM.MNO) JOIN NARUMARU NM ON(MM.NMNO=NM.NMNO) WHERE NM.NM_CATEGORY=2 AND N.NEIGHBOR_MNO!=#{mno}

SELECT N.NNO ,M.MNO ,M.EMAIL, M.NICNAME, M.PROFILENAME , MM.NMNO, NM.NM_TITLE, CASE WHEN MM.NMNO IN( SELECT NMNO FROM MARU_MEMBER WHERE MNO IN(SELECT A.NEIGHBOR_MNO FROM NEIGHBOR A, NEIGHBOR B WHERE A.MNO=B.NEIGHBOR_MNO AND B.MNO=A.NEIGHBOR_MNO AND A.MNO=#{mno})) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS RESULT FROM NEIGHBOR N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.NEIGHBOR_MNO=M.MNO) JOIN MARU_MEMBER MM ON(M.MNO=MM.MNO) JOIN NARUMARU NM ON(MM.NMNO=NM.NMNO) WHERE NM.NM_CATEGORY=2 AND N.NEIGHBOR_MNO!=#{mno} ORDER BY RESULT ASC, N.NNO DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NEIGHBOR WHERE MNO=#{mno} AND NEIGHBOR_MNO=#{user_mno}
